name: World of Motors
description:
A game tailored to your requirements.
Challenges and races to collect money and buy cars

You can completely modify your car

Modification for all cars
Set the car main camera to enjoy the way that suits you
Driving comfort

Adjustment of weights

car color modification

realistic cars

Editing plates

Full body photo editing and color adjustment

car suspension

Change license plate through the menu

night lighting

Different cities and maps
